headline.main: NAPLES SHOWERS GIFTS ON ALLIES; Flowers and Fruit Pour Into Jeeps -- Shouting Crowds Line Roads to City JOY MIXED WITH HATRED People Call Death to Germans -- American Patrols Wipe Out Fascist Italian Snipers

lead_paragraph: NAPLES, Oct. 2 -- Flowers and grapes poured into our jeep as we engaged in a kind of "chariot race" with tanks, Bren gun-carriers and half-tracks entering Naples yesterday morning. Naturally there was no resistance and, as far as we went, no mines.
abstract: US patrols wipe out Fascist Ital snipers
snippet: NAPLES, Oct. 2 -- Flowers and grapes poured into our jeep as we engaged in a kind of "chariot race" with tanks, Bren gun-carriers and half-tracks entering Naples yesterday morning. Naturally there was no resistance and, as far as we went, no mines...

byline.original: By HERBERT L. MATTHEWSBy Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
